modName: Cienna Jeanitte- Breton Follower (and RaceMenu Preset)
summary: I never thought I would make a Breton so cute... but I have :)
descriptionHtml:
[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]I don't play as a Breton that much... but this character I made recently may just change that. Introducing my Breton: Cienna Jeanitte.


[u][b]CIENNA JEANITTE[/b][/u]
Spending most of her life in High Rock, Cienna had trained to be the perfect conjurer. While not quite there yet, she has learned quite a lot from training with her fellow Bretons. Pursuing to improve her arcane knowledge, Cienna traveled to Skyrim in order to join the College of Winterhold.

Again, use Amazing Follower Tweaks if you want to give her new weapons and armor.

And she can be married, no quest needed. Just speak to Maramal first.

You will find her in The Frozen Hearth in Winterhold.


[u][b]PRESET[/b][/u]
I also included a RaceMenu preset for Cienna. Being a standard Breton, no race mods are required, though The Eyes of Beauty, Brows and the SG Hair Pack are. This preset also uses pubic hair, but it's from the RaceMenu Overlay Compilation. While it isn't necessary, it's just something I threw on to help her
stand out.

The following mods are required to use this preset:
RaceMenu(obviously)
The Eyes of Beauty
Brows
SG Hair Pack 268 (Google it)


[u][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/u]
Simply unzip the folder and move the meshes and texture folders and the .esp file into you Skyrim Data folder. Simple enough.


[u][b]UNINSTALLATION[/b][/u]
Delete the “Cienna” folders in the meshes and textures folders, as well as the “Cienna_Jeanitte.esp” folders in the actors folders in meshes and textures:

Data\meshes\actors\character\facegendata\facegeom\Cienna_Jeanitte.esp
Data\textures\actors\character\facegendata\facetint\Cienna_Jeanitte.esp

And of course, delete the .esp file itself.



Mods used in screenshots:
The Eyes of Beauty by LogRaam
SGHair 268 by HelloSanta
Caliente's Beautiful Body Enhancer -CBBE- by caliente
Fair Skin Complexion by HHaleyy
Halo's Poser by Halo (available here: http://mod.dysintropi.me/halos-poser-1-0/)
JaySuS Swords by jaysus
TERA Armor Collection -CBBE- Standalone by Frigus
Azura's Dawn by Antiscamp
Seasons of Skyrim ENB by bronze316
JK's Skyrim by jkrojmal[/size][/color][/font]
author: BloodScourge88
